div.p: No. 1185, unit 830, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerks file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
May I ask, dear Mr M'Pherson, that the two Corporation men on the Yarra may be placed for a few weeks under my order, as I am anxious to replace some willows, put some other suitable plants for binding the Yarra Bank into the ground and effect some other improvements before the planting season entirely passes.
M's letter was referred to the Melbourne City Council Health Committee and Public Works Committee. MS file annotation: 'Comtte have no men at their disposal'. This situation was conveyed to M in E. FitzGibbon to M, 4 August 1871.
